index.noImmediateFeedback:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the no immediate feedback message
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal â†’ No Immediate Feedback screen (heading)
**When Users See This**: When the system has no automated suggestions and mentoring is available
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "No Immediate Feedback"
index.ourSystemsDontHave:
**Functional Purpose**: Informative message about lack of immediate suggestions
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal â†’ No Immediate Feedback screen (body paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When the system has no automated suggestions
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Our systems don't have any immediate suggestions about how to improve your code."
index.weRecommendRequesting:
**Functional Purpose**: Recommendation to request code review from a mentor
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal â†’ No Immediate Feedback screen (body paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When the system has no automated suggestions and mentoring is available
**Technical Context**: Includes `%{trackTitle}` which must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "We recommend requesting code review from one of our {track.title} mentors. They'll give you feedback on your code and ideas about how you can make it even more idiomatic. It's 100% free ðŸ™‚"
index.requestCodeReview:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to initiate a code review request
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal â†’ No Immediate Feedback screen (button)
**When Users See This**: When the system has no automated suggestions and mentoring is available
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Request code review"
index.youHaveMentoringSession:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating an active mentoring session
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal â†’ In Progress Mentoring screen (heading)
**When Users See This**: When a user has an active mentoring session for the exercise
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "You have a mentoring session active for this exercise."
index.itIsGenerallyGood:
**Functional Purpose**: Advice on communicating with the mentor about code changes
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal â†’ In Progress Mentoring screen (body paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When a user has an active mentoring session for the exercise
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "It is generally good practice to tell your mentor what you've changed in your code and ask them to take a look at your new version."
index.goToYourDiscussion:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to navigate to the mentor discussion
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal â†’ In Progress Mentoring screen (button)
**When Users See This**: When a user has an active mentoring session for the exercise

**Current English**: "Go to your discussion"
index.continueToExercise:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to continue to the exercise
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal â†’ In Progress Mentoring screen (button)
**When Users See This**: When a user has an active mentoring session for the exercise

index.noImmediateFeedbackNoSlot:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the no immediate feedback message when no mentoring slots are available
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal â†’ No Immediate Feedback No Available Mentoring Slot screen (heading)
